title: Sion invincible in ASCENSION!!
body:
Whenever Sion is in his passive and ascends he will be invurnable. After a long time he will get teleported and be vurnable again.
As you could see in the video it is qutie gamebreaking.

replies.body:
I like how darius kind of just gave up and started murdering everyone else after a while.

And yeah, that can be pretty gamebreaking but this is an RGM, so who knows.

Replied to some of the other posts around this bug, but posting here too for visibility.

We are taking a look into what is happening with this, but haven't been able to reproduce just yet.  Thanks for sending this in!

I have reproduced the bug 2 times as for now,  First sion needs to be in his passive while standing on the middle thingy. But what i saw is that there was an ally and an enemy on it aswell and for some odd reason he ascended.
I love how this is a thing and Shaco is the one that is blocked right now lol

> [{quoted}](name=A Danish Pastry,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=hFO0jckq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-19T22:00:19.184+0000)
>
> I love how this is a thing and Shaco is the one that is blocked right now lol

Shaco being disabled was not intended, sorry about that.  He should be back now though!
